resources.string: Hello! I\'m QuranGPT, your personal assistant for exploring the Quran. You can ask me questions about Quran passages, request explanations of verses, or even ask me to generate a prayer for you. Let\'s dive into the Word together!
Are you sure you want to delete all messages?
Are you sure you want to delete selected messages?
Your daily limit of messages has been reached. To enjoy unlimited messaging, consider upgrading to the QuranGPT addon. Simply type \'info\' for more details.
Your personal Quran assistant. Ask questions, explore verses, or request prayers.
Add books, parables, articles, plans, gospels, or a random verse.
